overview: Be a part of the rule-breaking CAPiTA team with The CAPiTA Movie DVD. Their first feature film promises to be nothing but another creative release of emotion and truth, with snowboarding as the common thread that links the artists, poets, free-thinkers and seekers at CAPiTA. Become a CAPiTAlist, and immerse yourself in this super scary corporation with the CAPiTA Movie DVD.
title: First Kiss
